tool_description: Tracks license term status, renewal dates, and contract milestones for active licensing agreements across all territories and platforms.

tracking_scope.description: Scope of tracking: single_license, content_portfolio, territory_specific, platform_specific

license_ids.description: Specific license IDs to track (required for single_license scope)

alert_threshold_days.description: Days before expiration to trigger alerts (30-365)

error_messages: Invalid tracking scope: Use one of [single_license, content_portfolio, territory_specific, platform_specific].
Missing required IDs: license_ids required when tracking_scope is single_license.
Invalid license IDs: One or more license IDs not found.
Invalid content IDs: One or more content IDs not found.
Invalid alert threshold: Must be between 30 and 365 days.
No matching licenses: No licenses found matching the specified filters.
usage: Specify tracking_scope and provide relevant IDs or filters. Set alert_threshold_days for expiration warnings. Tool provides comprehensive status updates for tracked licenses.

total_licenses_tracked.description: Total number of licenses being tracked

expiring_soon.description: Number of licenses expiring within alert threshold
